about.title: About Me
about.description: I'm a Computer Engineering student at the Federal University of Rio Grande do Sul (UFRGS) with experience in freelance development. I'm passionate about problem-solving and creating efficient, user-friendly applications. I'm adaptable, a quick learner, and comfortable working both independently and in collaborative team environments.

skills.title: Software Development
skills.description: Building standalone applications and integrated modules with attention to detail.

skills.description: Providing troubleshooting, installations, and technical assistance for software applications.

skills.title: Web Development
skills.description: Creating responsive and dynamic websites with modern technologies.
